text: is a Japanese politician who was the Minister of Health, Labour, and Welfare from 2023 to 2024. He is a member of the Liberal Democratic Party. He has been a member of the House of Councillors of Japan since 2012. He has been a member of the Commission for Universal Health by Chatham House and co-chaired by Helen Clark and Jakaya Kikwete.Commission for Universal Health Chatham House. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1951 births Category:Politicians from Tokyo Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Ministers of health, labour and welfare of Japan
